The Peanut Butter Banana Bites are a fantastic choice! You can't go wrong with the classic combo of peanut butter and banana. And you're right, this recipe is a great way to get some potassium and healthy fats in your diet. Plus, the no-bake aspect makes it super convenient and easy to prepare.

Here are some tips to keep in mind when making the Peanut Butter Banana Bites:

* Make sure to use ripe bananas, as they'll be sweeter and easier to mash.
* If you find the mixture too sticky, you can add a bit more oats or nuts to balance it out.
* Experiment with different types of nuts or seeds, like almonds or chia seeds, to add some crunch and nutrition.
* Consider using natural peanut butter with fewer added oils and sugars.
* Store the energy balls in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 5 days or freeze for up to 2 months.

Remember, the best part about making your own energy balls is that you can customize them to your taste preferences and dietary needs. Feel free to get creative and add your own favorite ingredients or spices to make them even more delicious and nutritious!

If you have any more questions or need any substitutions or variations, just let me know. I'm always here to help. Happy snacking!
